The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal and the height is half the length of the sides. The shape's height, width, and length are 0.0051 m, 0.75 m, and 0.75 m, respectively.</description>

Part 2: A cylindrical object with a smaller cylinder on top, both with a flat bottom. Create a new coordinate system according to the JSON data. The first face contains a circle with a radius of 0.0365 and a center at [0.0365, 0.0365]. The second face also has a circle with the same radius and center at [0.0365, 0.451]. After scaling the sketch by a factor of 0.4875, extrude the circles in the normal direction by 0.1407 units. This creates the final shape for this part, which is a cylindrical object with a smaller cylinder on top, both having a flat bottom. The final CAD model consists of two intermediate parts: a slightly tapered rectangular prism, and a cylindrical object with a smaller cylinder on top. These parts have been built according to the provided JSON data, specifying their shapes, dimensions, and geometric features.</description>
